#Changes in gene expression under different symbiotic activities regimes in a common aquarium sponge.

***

The common blue aquarium sponge is a cyanosponge commonly found in salt water aquaria. Most aquarium hobbiest refer to this sponge as *Collospongia auris*, however its taxonomic affiliation is not clear.
Thus, here this sponge is refer to as the Common Blue Aquarium Sponge (CBAS). CBAS is a cyanosponge, it harbours cyanobacteria from the Candidatus *Synechococcus spongiarum* clade.
